mutants.mutated_line: avg *= k
mutants.code:
def find_subarray_with_least_average(nums, k):
    minAvg = 0
    avg = 0
    index = 1
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(k):
        avg += nums[i]
    avg *= k
    minAvg = avg
    for i in range(1, n - k + 1):
        avg = (avg * k - nums[i - 1] + nums[i + k - 1]) / k
        if minAvg > avg:
            minAvg = avg
            index = i + 1
    return index

def find_subarray_with_least_average(nums, k):
    minAvg = 0
    avg = 0
    index = 1
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(k):
        avg += nums[i]
    avg /= k
    minAvg = avg
    for i in range(1, n - k + 1):
        avg = (avg * k - nums[i - -1] + nums[i + k - 1]) / k
        if minAvg > avg:
            minAvg = avg
            index = i + 1
    return index
